Open source data publishing on demand.
Sign up now.

The Data Place offers a flexible data catalogue, based on the open source CKAN product, that can be scaled or diversified to meet multiple requirements, and an integrated, bespoke, front end web site that provides the ability to visualise, disseminate, and maximise the value of the underlying data.

The Story Platform

We can supplement our CKAN datastores with a flexible CMS based on open source technologies Wagtail and Django. These use the same underlying codebase as CKAN offering almost unlimited opportunities for integration.

Easy

It's easy and quick to set up your first data store and get the most from publishing your data.

Secure

Your data store lives in a secure, backed up and ISO27001 compliant UK data centre.

Flexible

Start, increase, downsize or stop your plan any time - without penalty.
